body:
Example failure:

https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/0f9f239a/windows-amd64-gce_a28c2438.log
```
# go run run.go -- heapsampling.go
exit status 1
panic: main.alloc want total count > 0 && <= 307200000, got 0

goroutine 1 [running]:
main.checkAllocations(0xc102f5c000, 0x9, 0x3b, 0x5338c0, 0xa, 0x186a0, 0xc08202bef0, 0x3, 0x3)
	C:/workdir/go/test/heapsampling.go:82 +0x578
main.main()
	C:/workdir/go/test/heapsampling.go:34 +0x164
exit status 2

FAIL	heapsampling.go	2.465s
2015/10/29 14:50:56 Failed: exit status 1
```
